Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 01:30AM emmagoldman wrote: I am proud to be a cancer bitch. That's the name of my blog. http://cancerbitch.blogspot.com I was going to call it "cancer babe" but that seemed too sweet. I have (had) cancer and I can bitch about it and be a bitch about it. It turns out, I complain mostly about the doctors and not the cancer itself.
Posts.Title: Desperate Housewives, "cancer bitch?" Catgo emmagoldman
